pageContext.title: SLIGHTLY STOOPID / FISHBONE- Whipper Snapper
pageContext.content:
For over three decades, Fishbone have been performing their eclectic mix of punk, ska, reggae, and funk music to delighted crowds, and continuously pushing their creative envelope. It was with this spark of inspiration in mind that brought DC-Jam Records to team them up with current jam band champions Slightly Stoopid to release this exclusive split 7″.

This limited release features the track “Ska Diddy” from Slightly Stoopid’s 2012 release Top Of The World on side A, (Featuring Angelo Moore of Fishbone) and a brand new song from Fishbone on side B; the tune “Whipper Snapper”, which will appear on the group’s upcoming release Intrinsically Intertwined. This deluxe single is a must have for any fan of smooth-jamming fusion, and is pressed on special green-colored vinyl!
